mapper.sql: id, ParentDepartment, Department,telephone,email, ContactName, Contact, operator
mapper.insert: insert into t_number (id, ParentDepartment, Department, telephone,email, ContactName, Contact, operator) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{parentdepartment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{department,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contactname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contact,jdbcType=BIGINT},#{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

id,

mapper.update:
update t_number
ParentDepartment = #{parentdepartment,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Department = #{department,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
telephone = #{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ContactName = #{contactname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Contact = #{contact,jdbcType=BIGINT},
Contact = #{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
select from t_number
operator LIKE concat("%",#{operator},"%")
ParentDepartment LIKE concat("%",#{parentdepartment},"%")
AND Department LIKE concat("%",#{department},"%")
AND telephone LIKE concat("%",#{telephone},"%")
limit #{startline}, #{pagesize}

select count(id) from t_number
